QUOTES.content: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
QUOTES.author: Dalai Lama

QUOTES.content: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, not to worry about the future, or not to anticipate troubles, but to live in the present moment wisely and earnestly.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: There are only two mistakes one can make along the road to truth; not going all the way, and not starting.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: To conquer oneself is a greater victory than to conquer thousands in a battle.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: In the end, only three things matter: how much you loved, how gently you lived, and how gracefully you let go of things not meant for you.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think we become.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Just as a snake sheds its skin, we must shed our past over and over again.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: What you are is what you have been. What you'll be is what you do now.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: All things appear and disappear because of the concurrence of causes and conditions. Nothing ever exists entirely alone; everything is in relation to everything else.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: The trouble is, you think you have time.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: The less you respond to negative people, the more peaceful your life will become.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Your worst enemy cannot harm you as much as your own unguarded thoughts.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: You only lose what you cling to.
QUOTES.author: Buddha

QUOTES.content: Just as treasures are uncovered from the earth, so virtue appears from good deeds, and wisdom appears from a pure and peaceful mind. To walk safely through the maze of human life, one needs the light of wisdom and the guidance of virtue.
QUOTES.author: Buddha
